description: Welcome to Central Acupuncture Conveniently located in Annandale, VA, at the heart of Northern Virginia, Central Acupuncture & Herb Clinic focuses on achieving each patient's health and wellness naturally through Integrative Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Herbs. Acupuncture
cleaned_text: Welcome to Central Acupuncture Conveniently located in Annandale, VA, at the heart of Northern Virginia, Central Acupuncture & Herb Clinic focuses on achieving each patient's health and wellness naturally through Integrative Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Herbs. WE ACCEPT INSURANCE CareFirst / Blue Cross Blue Shield / Aetna / UnitedHealthcare / Triwest Many Insurance companies will cover acupuncture treatments. Our office will gladly contact your insurance company for you. Our office will gladly contact your insurance company for you. Trusted Name in Acupuncture & Oriental Medicine since 1983 in Washington Metro Area With a strong educational background and extensive clinical experience, Dr. Meeree Yun has built up a long history in the Washington, D.C. metropolitan area as a warm, professional practitioner of acupuncture and oriental medicine since 1983.
